PDB2SQL¶

pdb2sql.__init__(pdbfile, **kwargs)[source]¶

Create a SQL database with PDB data.

Parameters

pdbfile (str, list, ndarray) – pdb file or data

Examples

>>> db = pdb2sql.pdb2sql('3CRO.pdb')

Process PDB¶

read_pdb(pdbfile)

Read pdb file or data to a list.

exportpdb(fname[, append, periodic])

Export a PDB file with kwargs selection.

sql2pdb(**kwargs)

Convert SQL data to PDB formatted lines

Get SQL Data¶

get(columns, **kwargs)

Exectute simple SQL query to extract values of attributes for certain conditions.

get_colnames()

Get SQL column names

get_chains(**kwargs)

Get the chain IDs.

get_residues(**kwargs)

Get the residue sequence.

get_xyz(**kwargs)

Shortcut to get the xyz coordinates.

Set SQL data¶

update(columns, values, **kwargs)

Update the database with given values.

add_column(colname[, coltype, value])

Add an new column to the ATOM table with same value for each row.

update_column(colname, values[, index])

Update a single column.

update_xyz(xyz, **kwargs)

Update the xyz coordinates.

Print SQL data¶

pprint()

Fancy print of SQL ATOM table.

print()

Print out SQL ATOM table.

print_colnames()

Print out SQL column names.
